- Location: Ceiling-mounted HVAC vent (rectangular louvered grille).
- Material: White painted metal/plastic grille with horizontal slats; frame secured by two screws.
- Condition: No visible damage; frame appears secure; minor dust in louvers.
- Fit/Sealing: Small gap at left edge between frame and ceiling; potential air leakage path.
- Maintenance: Recommend routine cleaning of louvers; verify damper operation if needed.
